summary: The diff implements a comprehensive fix for the quantity loading issue on the dashboard. A new orderNormalizer.ts utility was added with normalizeOrder, normalizeOrders, and getQuantityAsNumber helpers to safely handle bigint/number quantity conversion. These utilities are used across Dashboard.tsx, SummaryCards.tsx, OrderTable.tsx, TotalOrdersTab.tsx, KarigarsTab.tsx, ReadyTab.tsx, SuppliedQtyDialog.tsx, KarigarDetail.tsx, TagPrinting.tsx, UnmappedCodes.tsx, and exportUtils.ts. The backend query in useQueries.ts returns orders directly without explicit normalization at the hook level, with normalization done at the consumer level instead. All REQ-1 acceptance criteria appear to be addressed.
